item.title: Goa CET (GCET 2015) exam dates announced
item.description: Goa CET or GCET 2015 will be conducted on 5 and 6 May, 2015.

item.title: Online applications begin for GATE 2015 for admission to IITs & IISc.
item.description: Online applications for GATE 2015 began from 1 September and are open till 1 October, 2014.

item.title: VIT University's Masters Entrance Exam - VITMEE 2014 for MCA & M.Tech
item.description: VIT University's Masters Entrance Exam - VITMEE 2014 will be conducted for admissions to the MCA & M.Tech programs at VIT Velore and VIT Chennai campus.

item.title: Apply online by 13 April for Symbiosis Entrance Test (SET 2014) for UG programs in Law, Design, Engineering, Health
item.description: The Symbiosis Entrance Test (SET) 2014 is a written exam that evaluates candidates for admission to under graduate programs in law, design, engineering, health sciences at Symbiosis International University's (SIU) institutes.

item.title: UPSC Engineering Services Examination 2018 Important Dates & Application Form
item.description: UPSC will conduct the Engineering Services Examination (preliminary) 2017 on 8 January for recruitment of engineers to government services.

item.title: Osmania University to conduct PGECET 2014 for admission to PG courses in Andhra Universities
item.description: Get admission to engineering/ architecture/ pharmacy post-graduate courses offered by colleges/ universities of Andhra through PGECET 2014!

item.title: Guru Gobind Singh Indraprastha University's GGSIPU CET 2014 Exam Schedule
item.description: Planning on getting into Indraprastha University? Read through this article to know more on applying and registering for Guru Gobind Singh Indraprastha University's CET 2014.

item.title: Engineering, Agriculture & Medical Common Entrance (EAMCET) 2014 for Adnhra Pradesh students
item.description: Are you preparing for entrance exams for Engineering or Medicine? Learn more about EAMCET 2014.

item.title: IITs to conduct Joint Entrance Examination (JEE Advanced 2014) on 25 May
item.description: If you are planning on writing the IIT JEE (Mains) examination in April 2014, make sure you read this article regarding JEE (Advanced) - 2014, which is the second stage of selection into the prestigious Indian Institute of Technology campus. Only the top 1.5 lakh ranks qualify to appear for this.

item.title: Tamil Nadu Common Entrance Test (TANCET) 2014 for MBA, MCA, M.E/ M.Tech/ M.Arch/ M.Plan
item.description: Anna University, Chennai, on behalf of the government of Tamil Nadu will conduct the Tamil Nadu Common Entrance Test (TANCET) 2014 for admissions to MBA, MCA, M.E/ M.Tech/ M.Arch/ M.Plan.

item.title: Indian Navy invites Applications through 10+2 (B.Tech) Cadet Entry, July 2014
item.description: Are you looking at a career in the Indian defence forces? Indian Navy is inviting applications under the 10+2 (B.Tech) cadet entry scheme for course commencing on July 2014. Find out about the eligibility requirements, how to apply and the selection process.

item.title: TERI University invites Admission to M.Sc, MBA, M. Tech and M.A. Programs 2014-15
item.description: Applications to M.Sc, MBA, M. Tech and M.A. Programs 2014 - 2015 invited by TERI university.

item.title: Admission to IIST's B. Tech Programs through JEE Main & JEE Advanced 2014
item.description: Clear JEE Main and JEE Advanced 2014 to gain admission to the B.tech programs offered by Indian Institute of Space Science and Technology (IIST) Thiruvananthapuram.

item.title: GATE 2014 to Be Conducted by IIT Kharagpur
item.description: The online application for GATE 2014 opens in early September and closes in early October. GATE scores can be used to apply for scholarships and employment.

item.title: Tolani Maritime Institute's TMISAT 2013 for B.S. Maritime Engineering & Nautical Technology
item.description: TMISAT 2013 for admission to two maritime courses will be held in April and June. Find out about details of the admission process to Tolani Maritime Institute.

item.title: Jamia Hamdard begins Undergraduate Admissions for 2013 - 14
item.description: Jamia Hamdard has announced the schedule for its admission procedure for the academic session 2013-2014.

item.title: UPSC to conduct Engineering Services Exam 2013 from 28 June 2013
item.description: Learn all about the competitive engineering entrance exams conducted by the UPSC to recruit engineers to various posts and services.

item.title: Post-Graduate Engineering Common Entrance Test (PGECET) 2013 to be held by Osmania University
item.description: PGECET 2013 will take place between 22 May and 25 May, 2013. Learn more about important dates for application submission, the exam schedule and how to apply.

item.title: Maharashtra Technology-Common Entrance Test (MT-CET) 2013
item.description: The MT-CET, formerly the Maharashtra Health and Technology-Common Entrance Test (MHT-CET), will be held on 16 May, 2013. Learn registration details and understand what the test covers.

item.title: Symbiosis Entrance Test (SET) 2013
item.description: The entrance test for undergraduate admission to Symbiosis International University will be offered on 4 May, 2013. Find out test administration details.

item.title: SSC Junior Engineers (Civil, Mechanical, Electrical, Quantity Surveying and Contract) Examination 2013
item.description: A Combined All India Open Examination will be held on 19 May 2013. The exam recruits for various posts in departments such as Central Public Works, Military Engineering Service and Central Water Commission.

item.title: Engineering, Agriculture and Medical Common Entrance Test (EAMCET) 2013
item.description: EAMCET 2013 will be held on 10 May 2013. Find out important details and how to apply.

item.title: GGSIPU CET 2013 - 2014 Schedule (Guru Gobind Singh Indraprastha University Common Entrance Tests)
item.description: Guru Gobind Singh Indraprastha University (GGSIPU) CET 2013-14 schedule for admission to courses like courses on engineering, technology, management, medicine, law, journalism and mass communication.

item.title: OJEE 2013 Exam (Odisha Joint Entrance Exam)
item.description: OJEE 2013 will be conducted on 12 May 2013 for admission bachelors and masters degree courses in engineering, architecture, pharmacy, homeopathy, ayurveda, computer application, management offered by universities , government colleges and private colleges of Odisha (Orissa).

item.title: VITEEE 2013 Exam Notification
item.description: VITEEE 2013 will be held in April for admission to Bachelor of Technology programs. VIT has two campuses: Vellore and Chennai.
